front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for IEEE 1671 Test Equipment Templates and Extension Classes for Describing Intrinsic Signal Path Information for Cables, Interface Adapters, and Test Equipment
front.abstract: Recommended practices to extend the ATML exchange formats for the purposes of describing intrinsic paths are provided. An XML schema, an ATML instance document, and use cases related to intrinsic path characterizations are presented in this recommended practice.
